extension.name: AcyMailing Tag : Manage the Subscription
extension.author: Acyba
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2015 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
extension.description: This plugin enables you to add link to manage the subscription of the user

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: unsubscribetemplate
param.label: Display the unsubscribe page
param.description: Select if you want to display the unsubscribe page (when the user clicks on the unsubscribe link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: unsubscribeitemid
param.label: Unsubscribe Page Itemid
param.description: Itemid attached to your unsubscribe page

param.name: listunsubscribe
param.label: Add list-unsubscribe header
param.description: If you insert an unsubscribe link, should Acy also insert the link in the list-unsubscribe field? See www.list-unsubscribe.com

param.name: listunsubscribeemail
param.label: List-unsubscribe e-mail
param.description: The GMail feedback loops works with a list-unsubscribe e-mail address. By default Acy will add the reply-to e-mail address but you can specify another e-mail address there

param.name: modifytemplate
param.label: Display the modify your subscription
param.description: Select if you want to display the modify your subscription page (when the user clicks on the modify you subscription link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: modifyitemid
param.label: Modify your subscription Page Itemid
param.description: Itemid attached to your modify your subscription page

param.name: confirmtemplate
param.label: Display the confirmation page
param.description: Select if you want to display the confirmation page (when the user clicks on the confirmation link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: confirmitemid
param.label: Confirmation Page Itemid
param.description: Itemid attached to your confirmation page

param.name: displayfilter_mail
param.label: Display filter
param.description: Display the subscription filter on the Newsletter creation interface

param.name: frontendaccess
param.label: Front-end Access
param.description: You can restrict the access to this tag system with this option
param.option: Don't display this tag system on the front-end
